title: "It's cool to be different": Molly McCann on how she trains and why she fights
text:
View this post on Instagram

Three years ago today I made big Dunc get a picture with me.. he asked “are you any good girl?” My response “I’ll be a world champ and in the ufc soon enough. Remember the name MEATBALL 😂”. I was training in Liverpool and Bournemouth. Doing 20+ pts a week, training three times a day and traveling on that train from b’mouth to Liverpool, having to train 4:30am, Pt clients, get a 5 hour train to Lpool then train 6-8:30pm. The roads been long, the roads been lonely. But what a road it’s been. Anyone going through it, keep going through it. Because greatness is on the other side! Also massive thanks to everyone who’s never give up and helped me on this journey 💙
